author: william adrian

text:
For a last boss, to be honest, this music is kind of disappointing.
Just like Dragon Quest 4's final boss. I would have preferred that they put the regular boss music over the supposedly epic fight with that fat monster.
author: Multipurpose Dimwit | That's right, I've changed my name again

text: @Multipurpose Dimwit | That's right, I've changed my name again Hey, this is a HORRIBLE orchestration. Every part needs to be blaring in your ears for the proper effect. Turn your volume up a lot, it may help with that a little but the aesthetic's just not there with this rendition.
